00001 //  MeCab -- Yet Another Part-of-Speech and Morphological Analyzer
00002 //
00003 //  $Id: string_buffer.h 173 2009-04-18 08:10:57Z taku-ku $;

00007 #ifndef MECAB_STRINGBUFFER_H
00008 #define MECAB_STRINGBUFFER_H
00009 
00010 #include <string>
00011 #include "common.h"
00012 #include "utils.h"
00013 
00014 namespace MeCab {
00015 
00016 #define _ITOA(n)  do { char fbuf[64]; itoa(n, fbuf); return this->write(fbuf); } while (0)
00017 #define _UITOA(n) do { char fbuf[64]; uitoa(n, fbuf); return this->write(fbuf);} while (0)
00018 #define _DTOA(n)  do { char fbuf[64]; dtoa(n, fbuf); return this->write(fbuf); } while (0)
00019 
00020 class StringBuffer {
00021  private:
00022   size_t  size_;
00023   size_t  alloc_size_;
00024   char   *ptr_;
00025   bool    is_delete_;
00026   bool    error_;
00027   bool    reserve(size_t);
00028 
00029  public:
00030   explicit StringBuffer(): size_(0), alloc_size_(0),
00031                            ptr_(0), is_delete_(true), error_(false) {}
00032   explicit StringBuffer(char *_s, size_t _l):
00033       size_(0), alloc_size_(_l), ptr_(_s),
00034       is_delete_(false), error_(false) {}
00035 
00036   virtual ~StringBuffer();
00037 
00038   StringBuffer& write(char);
00039   StringBuffer& write(const char*, size_t);
00040   StringBuffer& write(const char*);
00041   StringBuffer& operator<<(double n)             { _DTOA(n); }
00042   StringBuffer& operator<<(short int n)          { _ITOA(n); }
00043   StringBuffer& operator<<(int n)                { _ITOA(n); }
00044   StringBuffer& operator<<(long int n)           { _ITOA(n); }
00045   StringBuffer& operator<<(unsigned short int n) { _UITOA(n); }
00046   StringBuffer& operator<<(unsigned int n)       { _UITOA(n); }
00047   StringBuffer& operator<<(unsigned long int n)  { _UITOA(n); }
00048 
00049   StringBuffer& operator<< (char n) {
00050     return this->write(n);
00051   }
00052 
00053   StringBuffer& operator<< (unsigned char n) {
00054     return this->write(n);
00055   }
00056 
00057   StringBuffer& operator<< (const char* n) {
00058     return this->write(n);
00059   }
00060 
00061   StringBuffer& operator<< (const std::string& n) {
00062     return this->write(n.c_str());
00063   }
00064 
00065   void clear() { size_ = 0; }
00066   const char *str() const {
00067     return error_ ?  0 : const_cast<const char*>(ptr_);
00068   }
00069 };
00070 }
00071 
00072 #endif
